page.title: 18A Saturday for Leigh.
page.content: I wake up at six on Saturday morning, go in the bathroom and wash and then put the kettle on. Then I drink my tea put my clothes on and then pull my truck out. When my brothers are ready we go down to Ellesmere with the truck and we get metal from houses because my dad collects and sells scrap metal. When it is two we go to Pet's cafe and get a drink and a bacon bap. When we have eaten we go and get the truck and go out again. Sometimes it takes a long time and sometimes we go out and find a whole load quickly. Some saturdays ,we dont have any at all.
